pageProps.title: How to Synchronize State Between React Components
pageProps.metaDesc: React is a popular JavaScript library used for building user interfaces. One of the key features of React is its ability to manage state, which allows for dynamic, interactive components. However, when working with multiple components that need to share the same state, it can become challenging to keep everything in sync. In this article, we will explore different ways to synchronize state between React components.
